title: Monitoring Engineer
content:
As a Monitoring Engineer, you deliver observability services as part of our OMP Platform. You combine the worlds of data producers and data consumers, as well as growing and maintaining the different tools and systems we use.
You are responsible for:
Setting up and maintaining various tools and systems in the observability platform.
Making sure the latest versions are used and all systems are well documented and delivered in code.
Working closely with your team and internal customers such as operations, customer services, developers, and testers.
Playing a key role in the observability service and building a scalable, easy-to-setup system.
Maintaining observability as code by creating dashboards, setting up alerts, and ensuring they end in the right processes and systems for follow-up.
Proactively following up on the evolution of the organization and proposing new ways to improve our observability service.
Educating and training people on how to use the observability service.
